item.title: LaunchURL Commands not working
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

launchURL is a client-based command.
It is, in no way, server sided.
If you are trying to load it server sided, that is your issue.
When you specify a url, make sure it is a full url.
A.K.A if my forums were: moparisthebest.com
You would want to make it a full URL by adding either “http://”, “https://” or “www.” to it.
I’d go with “http://YourForumURL.com”, personally.

Read full topic

item.title: LaunchURL Commands not working
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

Title is basically summing it up. commands on my 317 [PI] such as ::forums, ::vote, & ::donate do not launch a url. I have searched around, and cannot find a reason. Also, I know it is not a problem in the client sided client.java, because i have a method in there for all of the above that says:

[spoiler]if(inputString.equals("::forums")) {
launchURL(“forum website here”);
}[/spoiler]

If anyone could help that would be marvelous. P.S. - I am thinking the issue has something to do with the URL, because i had the command ::forums working just fine, but i made a new forums and tried changing the url to it and now it wont launch anything. Please help :eek:

Read full topic
